description: This file implements the Monitor plugin class for a WPEFramework-based system, providing API methods for managing plugin restart limits, resetting statistics, retrieving status, and signaling actions. It includes registration of API endpoints, implementation of endpoint handlers, and event signaling.

classes.name: Monitor
classes.description: Main class implementing monitoring API endpoints and event signaling within the WPEFramework plugin.

methods.name: void RegisterAll()
methods.description: Registers all API endpoints for the Monitor plugin.

methods.name: void UnregisterAll()
methods.description: Unregisters all API endpoints for the Monitor plugin.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_restartlimits(const RestartlimitsParamsData & params)
methods.description: Handles setting new restart limits for a specified plugin.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData & params,InfoInfo & response)
methods.description: Handles resetting memory and process statistics for a plugin and updates the response.

methods.name: uint32_t get_status(const string & index,Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo> & response) const
methods.description: Retrieves memory and process statistics for a plugin or all plugins.

methods.name: void event_action(const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)
methods.description: Signals an action taken by the monitor, such as an event occurrence.

ctags.name: endpoint_resetstats
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData& params, InfoInfo& response/

ctags.name: event_action
ctags.pattern: /^    void Monitor::event_action(const string& callsign, const string& action, const string& reaso/
ctags.signature: (const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)

ctags.name: get_status
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::get_status(const string& index, Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo>& response)/
